objectives.name: Talk to Flowering Meadow at Harvest Den.

objectives.hint: You can pick up the flower, take a few steps back and collect the same one as many times as you want.
objectives.name: Gather five wildflowers for Flowering Meadow.
Give the collected wildflowers to Flowering Meadow.
Deliver wildflowers and a love letter to a kodan named Winter Sky.
Earn Winter Sky's trust by defending the bridge to Blue Ice Shining.
Pick up a corrupted ice shard.
Bring Winter Sky a corrupted ice shard.
Deliver an ice sculpture and a message to Flowering Meadow.

objectives.hint: Complete the event. Check Buzzy Treetops section.
objectives.name: Get honey from the honey-gathering event.
Get healing herbs from the "Heal the wounded wolf pup" event...
Give the ingredients to Flowering Meadow.
Give Winter Sky the healing concoction.
Meet Flowering Meadow and Winter Sky in Harvest Den. Talk to Distant Thunder.

objectives.hint: Complete "Dance among the kodan" or "Get warclaw cubs back in their pens before they eat the cabbages" events.
objectives.name: Earn Distant Thunder's trust by completing events in Harvest Den.
Convince Distant Thunder to let Winter Sky stay.
Go back to the couple at their homestead in Harvest Den.
